Author: die4creamyjalapeno
Text: Don’t purge. Distract yourself for a little while until the full feeling is gone. Force yourself to take a walk, watch a full movie, play a game you like, take a bath, or whatever you need to do. If you really can’t stop yourself from purging you should call somebody so that you pretty much can’t purge. If need be call a eating disorder hotline (not sure if one exists, but probably!) or something along those lines.
